name: 曾世杰
objective: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
schedule: 1.Physics andMeasurement 2.Motion in one dimension, Vector 3.Motion in three dimensions 4. The law of Motion 5.Circular motion and other applications of Newton's laws 6.Energy of system 7.Conservation of energy  8.Linear momentum and collisions 9.Rotation of rigid objection about a fixed axis 10. Angular Momentum 11.Static equilibrium and Elasticity, Unversal gravitation 12.Fluid mechanics 13 Oscillatry motion 14 Wave motion 15 Superposition and standing waves
scorePolicy: 作業10% 平時考20 期中考35% 期末考35%
materials: Physics for scientists and engineers  Serway
